cta.description: Simple. Choose a car. We arrange a detailed inspection. Based on that, you decide if you want it. Then we buy it, provide extended warranty, register it, and deliver it.
cta.checkFirst: Check the car first, decide later
cta.title: Try how Fast4Car works.

cta2.wantToCalculate: Want to calculate your car payment?
cta2.matchLenders: Find up to 4 lenders to get the lowest available rate with no fees or obligations.
cta2.step1Title: Check the car first, decide later
cta2.step1Desc1: Before committing, we will arrange a full inspection and provide a detailed report on the car’s technical condition.
cta2.step1Desc2: Only after reviewing the results do you decide whether to continue with the purchase.
cta2.step2Desc1: We trust the cars we sell, but for your peace of mind, each purchase includes a 6-month warranty covering key components: engine, transmission, and differential, along with protection from hidden defects.
cta2.step2Desc2: If you're not satisfied, you can return the car within 14 days of receiving it.
cta2.step3Desc1: Most vehicles can be delivered within 20 business days after order confirmation and payment.
cta2.step3Desc2: Note: Delivery times may vary depending on the vehicle's location and each country’s administrative requirements.

calculator.favourableFinancingDesc: Our favorable financing makes car buying accessible to everyone. Just choose your favorite car and a financing plan that fits your needs.
calculator.save15OrMore: Save 15% or more if you book and drive before April 1, 2025

about.headerSubtitle: Get the latest news, updates, and tips
about.introParagraph: Welcome to Fast4Car, your trusted partner in car rental. Since our founding, we have been committed to providing our customers with a smooth and reliable car rental experience. Whether you're planning a business trip, a family vacation, or just need a vehicle for everyday use, we offer a wide range of vehicles to meet your needs.
about.sellYourCar: Sell your car at a fair price. Start with us today.
about.missionParagraph: Our mission is to make car rental easy, accessible, and affordable for everyone. We believe that renting a car should be hassle-free, and we are dedicated to ensuring every customer finds the perfect vehicle for their journey.
about.flexibleRentalOptions: Explore a wide range of flexible rental options to suit your needs
about.insuranceCoverage: Comprehensive insurance coverage for total peace of mind
about.customerSupport: 24/7 customer support for assistance anytime, anywhere
about.clearPricingSupport: Fast4Car offers transparent pricing and excellent 24/7 support.
about.commitmentParagraph: We are committed to offering clear pricing with no hidden fees, comprehensive insurance options for added peace of mind, and 24/7 customer support to assist you whenever needed. At Fast4Car, your satisfaction is our priority.
about.stayAhead: Stay on top of the latest releases and upcoming events
about.whatTheySay: What do they say about us?
about.noHiddenFeesDesc: The attention to detail in the booking process made our trip stress-free, allowing us to focus on creating lasting memories together.
about.mobileFriendlyDesc: Making our dream vacation a reality was very easy thanks to the great coordination of listings and hotels with this platform.
about.excellentCustomerServiceDesc: The entire process was not only efficient but also enriching, as the platform’s intuitive design made every step enjoyable.
about.highlyFlexibleDesc: The attention to detail in the booking process made our trip stress-free, allowing us to focus on creating lasting memories together.

hero.title: How does Fast4Car work?
hero.description: Simple. Choose a car. We arrange a detailed inspection. Based on that, you decide if you want it. Then we buy it, offer an extended warranty, register it, and deliver it to you.

step1.title: Choose a car
step1.description: We process more than 7 million listings every day, but only recommend 10% for purchase. There’s usually something that 'doesn’t sit right' with us in the rest.

step2.title: We inspect the car
step2.description: We don’t own the cars we offer, so we first need to inspect them thoroughly. We know specific models and engines well and understand what to focus on for each.

step3.title: Order and pay
step3.description: You can pay for the car with your own money or finance it through Fast4Car. We have better terms arranged with many verified banks.

step4.title: We provide warranty
step4.description: There’s no risk in buying a car from Fast4Car. We pride ourselves on transparency and the impeccable condition of our vehicles.

step5.title: We buy the car
step5.description: We buy the car and deregister it in its country of origin. Each country has its own regulations.

step6.title: We deliver
step6.description: We can deliver the car directly to your door or you can pick it up from one of our delivery points. It’s your choice.

guarantee1.title: Full warranty
guarantee1.description: Each vehicle includes our premium warranty package that covers major mechanical components for complete peace of mind.

guarantee2.title: Verified quality
guarantee2.description: Every car goes through a rigorous 150-point inspection performed by certified technicians to ensure top quality and reliability.

guarantee3.title: Secure transaction
guarantee3.description: Your purchase is protected with our secure payment system and transparent documentation process.

cta.title: Try how Fast4Car works.
cta.description: Now all that's left is to choose your next car. We’ll be happy if you choose it with us.

reviews.title: Trustpilot Testimonials
reviews.subtitle: Read what our customers are saying about us on Trustpilot.

review1.text: It was a good experience with Anand, with hands-on expertise and all that.

review2.text: I loved how Alex took us through a Scrum tour, taking the time to talk about our experiences.

review3.text: Lorenz is an amazing tutor. He gave us lots of examples and real-life case studies.

car.specifications: Electric motor specifications for a new car
car.moreAboutDesc: The specified parameters of the electric system are indicative and represent the best possible option for a new vehicle. Actual values may vary depending on configuration, age, and technical condition of the vehicle.
car.equipmentDesc: The specified parameters of the electric system are indicative and represent the best possible option for a new vehicle. Actual values may vary depending on configuration, age, and technical condition of the vehicle.

howitworks.title: How it works
howitworks.step1Title: Check the car first, decide later
howitworks.step1Desc1:
Before committing, we arrange a thorough inspection and provide you with a detailed report on the car’s technical condition.
Only after reviewing the results do you decide whether to proceed with the purchase.
howitworks.step2Desc1:
We trust the cars we sell, but for your peace of mind, every purchase includes a 6-month warranty covering key components — engine, transmission, and differential — along with protection from hidden defects.
If you’re not satisfied, you can return the car within 14 days of receiving it.
howitworks.step3Desc1:
Most vehicles can be delivered within 20 business days after confirming your order and receiving payment.
Note: Delivery times may vary depending on the car’s location and administrative requirements of each country.

comparisonPage.title: Comparison
comparisonPage.desc:
Compared with over 408 similar vehicles offered in recent months.
We consider up to 70 vehicle features.
